name: Idle Music Maker
description:
An idle game where the goal is to make the best music possible and unlock lots of instruments, styles, and beats!

Every song once you get going is unique, never before heard, and something for you.

 It might be bad, it might be good.

But it's something you made.

Take a break, be relaxed, and see what you  can create.

All instructions are provided in game.

Blind Accessible
